summary: A scientific research team investigates and documents the supernatural phenomena surrounding the disappearance of a cattle ranchers 10 year old son. Inspired by true events that shocked the paranormal community around the world.
cast: Britani Bateman Underwood|Taylor Bateman|Steve Berg|Michael Black|Ken Bretschneider|Erin Cahill|Carol Call|Kyle Davis|Richard Dutcher|Mike Flynn|Jon Gries|Michael Horse|Nash Lucas|Devin McGinn|Murphy Michaels|Matthew Rocheleau|David H. Stevens|Anne Sward|Sandy Tiemann|Tobijah Tyler|Clint Vanderlinden
title: Skinwalker Ranch
